Comment: Abilities: A0N8 (Citadel Shield), Researchubertip (Tooltip - Learn - Extended)
Value: Channel the Citadel Shield. The shield will deal 20 damage per second to enemies in a 600 area of effect and increase the armor of friendly units and buildings by 4, for a maximum of 30 seconds. |n|n|cffffcc00Level 1|r - 20 damage per second |n|cffffcc00Level 2|r - 40 damage per second  |n|cffffcc00Level 3|r - 60 damage per second
